comment:
안녕하세요 !
이번 영상에서 영광스럽게도 기우슨생님께 머리를 받게 된 아정임돠

이렇게나 단시간에 많은 예쁜 말들을  받게 되다니!! 행복하구먼유!

호불호가 있을만한 머리스타일임에도 흔쾌히 해주신 기우슨생님.
선하고 예쁜 시선으로 봐주시는 분들이 이렇게 많다는 것에 넘모 행복함듕

제가 원하는 헤어스타일로 똿똿똭!
잘해주셔서 지금까지도 거의 손질 안 하고(물만 묻혀도 완벼크!) 에블데이 편하고 행복하게 지내고있는 아정이랍니댯! 저도 넘모 만족하고, 실제로 보신 분들이 예쁘다고 칭찬 많이 해주셨어요. 심지어 까탈레나 저희 오마니께서도요!!! 헤헿

촬영이 긴장돼서 말도 잘 못했는데 편집을 귀엽게 잘해주셔서 놀랬답니다!
편집자님께도 감사드리는 마음이어요 편집자님 덕에 영상 넘모 재밌게 봤슴댜 크크

버스 탔는데 제가 나오는 영상을 시청하시는 분도 뵙고!!! (뒤에서 우와 나닷) ㅋㅋ
오랜만인 친구들에게 연락도 많이 받았어요. 기우슨생님의 영향력을 실감한 아정임돵! 감사해요!! 🫶

기우슨생님께서 좋은 영향 주신만큼 저도 좋은 마음 가지고 지내고싶어요
망한머리 덕에 귀한경험을 ~
감사하고 행복한 시간이었슴댜~!

잔잔한 제 한 페이지에 특별한 추어크 뎌댱 

저를 선택해주시고 특별한 경험하게 해주신 기우쌔므 넘모매우 몹시 감쟈 백만개 드리고싶슴댜! 프로틴도 감쟈했어유!!!!!!!!!!
사연자님은 그저 고객이고 헤어 전문가인 헤어 디자이너가 된다고 해서 했을 뿐인데 왜 사연자님이 비난을 들어야 하는지 ㅠㅠ...? 사연자님 긍정 에너지 받아가게 되네요 ㅎㅎ
She's so appreciative, like I've never heard anyone truly be able to be satisfied so easily just by someone taking the effort to help them regardless of the results
유행같은 거 안 따지고 개성있게 살아가시는 모습 보기 좋은데요! 그리고 기우쌤도 오랜만에 도전적으로 임하시는 거 같아서 흥미롭게 잘 봤습니다 ㅋㅋㅋ 망머대는 출연자랑 기우쌤이 서로 윈윈하는 채널인 만큼 출연자분한테 너무 뭐라 안하셨음 하네요
진짜 긍정적인 에너지가 엄청 뿜뿜하신 분이다… 보는 내내 나까지 기분 좋아져 ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ ㅠㅠ
사연자분 완전 화창한 날의 햇살 그 자체  원하는 머리 나와서 다행입니다 관리 잘하셔서 다음 머리는 꼭 한번에 성공 하셨으면 좋겠습니다!

What I love about the people I've seen in your videos is how diverse their ideas of beauty are when it comes to hair. Usually, if I watch a hair channel from the West or Europe, all the women only want long hair and they would be devastated to try any short hairstyles. It's an amazing difference to see these women embrace all hairstyles as being beautiful hairstyles because I especially think short hair is so cute on women~
이번 사연자분 도전정신 강하고  완전 밝은 성격이신 것 같아요! 기우쌤은 앞머리 자를 때 되게 많이 조심스러우신 것 같았지만 사연자분은 오히려 더 신나계신 것 같아서 지금까지 본 망한머리 영상중에 제일 재밌었어요 >_<

New subscriber from South Carolina, USA🇺🇸   I love your hair correction videos!  It's so sad that these people had to go through such a bad experience.  You really do an excellent job at correcting tragic mistakes.
that hairstyle looks SOOOOOO cute on her!!! Im so glad she is able to be so bold and courageous :)
오늘도 마음속에 다시한번 새기고 갑니다. 탈색에 펌은 안됨 사연자님 머리 컬도 우아하고 풍성하게 잘 나왔고 앞머리도 처피뱅 해서 귀여움까지 동시에 있는게 너무 잘 어울리시네요!! ㅎㅎ 이미 일어난 일은 지나간 일이라고.. 긍정마인드도 너무 부럽습니다.
I love it how open she was towards her new haircut and experimenting...Kiu great job as always....
신청자분 너무 밝으시고 예의 바르시고 멋지세요><새로운 헤어 스타일 너무 잘 어울리시네요ㅎㅎ
It really suits her! She's bold and cute and that's exactly the feeling her hairstyle gives now. Really beautiful! Good job Kiu
I think she looks great with the shorter bangs. It frames her face so nicely! I want this haircut!
She looks adorable! Not many people can wear such short bangs, but she has an especially beautiful eye area, so the short bangs draw attention to that! Well done! ️
she looks so adorable and she seems so fun to be around with
amo ver ele fazendo o cabelo das pessoas
"I don't have to be perfect/I don't have to do well" is the most relieving thing to hear in all situations. She's so nice to relieve that burden off his shoulder :)

ive been watching alot of his videos lately and im happy to see im not the only one who's hair tangles easily or their hair dresser doesnt always do what you expect.. for example I asked for blonde with pink and he said the blonde wouldnt be that doable without completely damaging my hair so I said sure.. I got purple, blue, pink and the underneath was blonde from where bleach actually took out my previous hair dye.. I WAS SO UPSETTT + I have social anxiety so it isnt easy for me to just say "no"
I had to laugh so hard when he explained that he takes forever to cut bangs. As a fellow hairdresser, I know this feeling soooo well  Great result!! I really love your videos.
개인적으로 기우쌤 최고 컨텐츠는 망한머리 해결(?) 같아요!!!! 처음에 사연자분 들어오시면 저 머리를,,,? 하고 다 끝나고 나가시는 거 보면 진짜 옴총옴총 잘어울려서 매번 무슨 뾰로롱 마법 보는 거 같아요,,,,

리액션이 너무 좋은신 분이시군요! 본인도 아실까요? 본인의 발랄함이 주변 사람들에게 기분 좋은 기운을 주신다는 걸~
영상 보는 내내 뭔지 모를 활기참이 저에게 까지 전해져서 너무 기분 좋았습니다~

숏컷펌이랑 처피뱅 개인적으로 너무 좋아하는 스타일인데 나한테는 너무 안어울릴거 같아서 도전도 못하는 스타일링 2개가 너무 잘어울리시는 사연자분 ㅠㅠ
망한머리대회 보러왔다가 대리만족 제대로 하고 가요
Outstanding hairstyle !!! She totally knew what she likes & because of that could help Kiu be really aware of what would be the best with the damage already done!!
와 진짜 잘 어울리시고 개성 넘치신 분이다 탈색모에 펌을 저렇게 고퀄로 만드는 기우쌤 최고다 진짜

I am working abroad for a long time and have no chance to cut my hair in the salon, so I cut it yesterday myself and one side is longer than another xD Now I am watching Kiu's channel to see that people have even worse hair situations and it makes me feel better. Everything can be fixed c:
this haircut turned out to be so adorable! I was scared for the super short bangs, but they look so cute on her!
This is such a cute hairstyle! Very 90s  I like the client’s attitude of doing what she wants and not regretting too much - good way to stay positive
One of my favourite cut & styles so far - looks lovely, really suits her & a great transformation imo
I was nervous but she was totally right about the chooooppy bangs lol. She looks adorable! Great job once again
Her hair looked great. Way, way much better than when she came in. Great job as always. Wish I could have my hair done by you.

세상에 진짜 이번거 역대급인거같아요,,, 베티붑같고 
사연자분 초오오오오피뱅 머리도 넘 잘 어울려요,,,,, 
처음 볼때 세상에,,,,,, 될까,,, 했는데 이게 되네요,,, 이게 ,,,,,,,,,
She looks so adorable with that cut! Kiu's out there working miracles again

와 너무 이쁘게 되었어요  최근 망한머리 컨텐츠에서 복구한 스타일중에 완전  제 취향이네요  역시 기우쌤ㅎ  
마인드도 멋지시고 처피뱅이 잘어울리는 분이셨군요 ㅎㅎㅎ

저였으면 절데 안했을 헤어스타일이 저분한테는 어쩜 저리 잘 어울리시는지, 밝은 에너지와 너무 잘 어울리세요!     
쿨한 느낌보다 컬이 들어가야 더 어울릴 것 같다고 바로 알아보시는 기우쌤도 역시 전문가는 다르네요.

ah im the same way, never had the guts to cut choppy bangs~ but last month i worked up the courage to ask for a shag cut. my stylist and me ended up cutting my bangs abt a finger above my eyebrow and my curls have never been this bouncy and cute before! short hair is too cute, she suits this pixie so well!

i was so shocked to see her hair inspo photo bc thats the exact inspo haircut that i want for this summer 🫢 (i have natural wavy/curly hair but im too scared to go for it bc i have very round face)but she looks sooo cutee with this haircut and the choooooppy bangs such a positive person!
Of course she's a yoga instructor, with such a  cool and collected personality, she's so peaceful, so kind. She must be an amazing teacher. Her vibes are immaculate.
O corte ficou lindo  É do jeito que vou cortar em breve 🇧🇷🇧🇷
I LOVED the end result! It’s a short style that suits her face shape well. I would look like a crazy person with it, but she pulls it off beautifully!
She's so bubbly & loveable  love love her personality!! And the haircut suits her well

우와 진짜 잘 어울려요! 초피뱅도 너무 기엽구욤!!

This look suits her sooo well~
I love it!!!  She’s so cute and that hair looks great on her! Good job Kiu

I would say I get a horrible cut over 90% of the time. And I don't have hair that's too thin, thick, curly, etc. I even have taken photos in to show what I want. And I'm realistic about what kind of cut would look good and work with my hair type and I ask the stylist if they think the hair cut would work with my hair type. I have had good hair cuts before so I know it can be done. But it seems hairstylists move a lot and when I  find a good one they're gone in a year or two. I just think the standards for a hair dressing license where I live must be too lax. The last time I had my hair cut was in 2017 and I went to one of the top salons in my town. I swore that if it was a horrible cut it would be the last time I had a stylist cut my hair. And it was probably the worst hair cut I've ever had. I wanted to put a paper bag over my head. I was embarrassed to be seen in public and having my hair cut there was not cheap. So, now my hair is just very long and I keep it in a braid.
